item.title: Alerting
item.description: Alerting Gardener uses Prometheus to gather metrics from each component. A Prometheus is deployed in each shoot control plane (on the seed) which is responsible for gathering control plane and cluster metrics. Prometheus can be configured to fire alerts based on these metrics and send them to an alertmanager. The alertmanager is responsible for sending the alerts to users and operators.
